cards.name: Bear Island Scout
cards.text: Reaction: After you marshal Bear Island Scout, if each character you control has the [stark] affiliation, search your deck for a House Mormont card, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Skagos
cards.text: Shadow (1). Action: Kneel Skagos and sacrifice a standing [stark] card to search your deck for a card with the same title as the sacrificed card and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Brightwater Host
cards.text: No attachments. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Brightwater Host is attacking, choose 1 card in shadows and return it to its owner's hand. Then, a unique [tyrell] character you control gains 2 power.

cards.name: The Might of the Reach
cards.text: Challenges Action: Choose a participating character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +10 STR.

cards.name: Three-Finger Hobb
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After you check reserve, if your hand size is lower than your reserve value, draw 2 cards.
cards.flavor: That night, Three-Finger Hobb cooked the boys a special meal to mark the occasion.

cards.name: Hardhome
cards.text: Shadow (2). Dominance Action: Kneel and sacrifice Hardhome to choose an opponent. That player sacrifices a standing character.
cards.flavor: Hardhome had been halfway toward becoming a town, the only true town north of the Wall, until the night six hundred years ago when hell had swallowed it.

cards.name: Storm's End Maester
cards.text: Challenges Action: Kneel Storm's End Maester to choose an opponent. If you have more power on your faction card than that player, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Glamor
cards.text: Character you control only. Shadow (2). Terminal. Attached character gets +2 STR. Action: Kill attached character to choose a character in your dead pile that was killed this phase. Return the chosen character to play.

cards.name: Painted Dogs
cards.text: Ambush (4). Challenges Action: Return Painted Dogs to your hand to choose and stand a Clansman character or Tyrion Lannister.

cards.name: Walk of Atonement
cards.text: Dominance Action: Discard any amount of power from a character you control. For each power discarded, discard 1 card at random from each opponent's hand and draw 1 card.
cards.flavor: I am not afraid. I am a lioness.

cards.name: Iron Victory's Crew
cards.text: No attachments. Reaction: After Iron Victory's Crew enters play, search your deck for a Warship location, reveal it, and add it to your hand (put it into play instead if it is Iron Victory). Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Refurbished Hulk
cards.text:
+1 Income.
+1 Initiative.
cards.flavor: She would need that long to make repairs; the stroms had left her little more than a hulk.

cards.name: Drogon
cards.text: Ambush (6). No attachments. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Drogon is attacking, choose a character controlled by the losing opponent. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -4 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.

cards.name: In Daznak's Pit
cards.text: Shadow (3). Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, stand each character. Following this phase, there is an additional challenges phase. (Max 1 per round.)

cards.name: Maester Myles
cards.text: Challenges Action: Kneel Maester Myles to choose a character with printed cost equal to or lower than the number of plot cards in your used pile. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice.

cards.name: He Calls It Thinking
cards.text: Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's non-agenda, non-plot triggered ability would initiate, cancel those effects unless that player pays 1 gold.
cards.flavor: "My father is very good at doing nothing." <cite>Arianne Martell</cite>

cards.name: Old Bill Bone
cards.text: Shadow (1). Reaction: After Old Bill Bone comes out of shadows, kneel each opponent's faction card.
cards.flavor: "Some say that herons are majestic... If your king eats frogs while standing on one leg."

cards.name: The Inn at the Crossroads
cards.text: Shadow (1). Dominance Action: Kneel The Inn at the Crossroads to draw 3 cards and choose an opponent. Give control of The Inn at the Crossroads to that player.

cards.name: A Pinch of Powder
cards.text: Shadow (1). Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] or [power] challenge by 5 or more STR as the attacking player, return attached character to its owner's hand.
cards.designer: Card design by 2008 Joust World Champion, Lucas Reed.

cards.name: Double-Dealing
cards.text: Plot Action: Choose a plot card in an opponent's used pile. Double-Dealing gains that plot card's printed text box (except for Traits) until you reveal a new plot card. (Limit once per round.)
